code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/ChatInput.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatInput=_ref=>{let{onSendMessage,disabled}=_ref;const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(message.trim()&&!disabled){onSendMessage(message);setMessage('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"chat-input",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type your health-related question here...",disabled:disabled}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:!message.trim()||disabled,children:"Send"})]});};export default ChatInput;
